mapper.select: select start_single as startSingle, over_single as overSingle, royalty, am.building_id as buildingId, am.building_name as buildingName, am.village_id as villageId, am.village_name as villageName from dj_area_match am INNER JOIN dj_area_match_setup ams on am.resource_id=ams.resource_id where am.building_name=#{buildingName} and am.village_id=#{villageId}

select max(over_single) as overSingle, royalty from dj_area_match am INNER JOIN dj_area_match_setup ams on am.resource_id=ams.resource_id where am.building_name=#{buildingName} and am.village_id=#{villageId}
